alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 3:35AM EST until February 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Areas of blowing snow likely. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer and Hamilton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of light to moderate snowfall is expected this morning with 1 to 2 inches of snow followed by a line of snow squalls during the late morning into the early afternoon. Lake-effect snow will then develop for the mid afternoon with additional light to moderate accumulations of 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
